entry.title: Announcing Operation Code Blog
entry.summary: Today we proudly launch our Operation Code blog where we’ll share thoughts, insights and lessons learned as we build a coding veterans service organization. While these two Operation Code videos best tell our story, let me explain here the “why” we exist

entry.title: Second Post
entry.summary:
You’re in! Nice. We’ve put together a little post to introduce you to the Ghost editor and get you started. Go ahead and edit this post to get going and learn how it all works!
Getting Started
Writing in markdown is really easy. In the left hand panel
